messages.content: No more gridlock. No more delays. It’s time to get stuff done. Let’s be honest. The country has been stuck in a rut. Parliament spent the last three years going round in circles - agreeing on nothing except more arguments. Don’t you think it’s time to get Brexit done and get on with the country’s priorities? Don’t you think it’s time to stop arguing about the past and start building the kind of future we want? A future where you don’t have to wait three weeks for a GP appointment - because our NHS has the funding it needs to thrive. And an immigration system that supports our public services instead of putting pressure on them. A future where you feel safe when you walk home at night - because our police have the officers they need to get a grip on crime. A future where your children get a world-class education - because no school is underfunded or left behind. This is the kind of future we can create together. It’s just within our grasp. At the last election, only nine seats stood short of a majority. This election will be just as close, and it all comes down to your vote.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Raising the threshold of National Insurance
keyPolicies.policyDescription: A tax cut of almost £100 next year, £500 a year by raising the National Insurance threshold.
Deliver 50 million more GP surgery appointments, 2000 more doctors, and upgrading 40 new hospitals.
Giving officers the powers they need to get crime under control.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protecting the winter fuel allowance, free bus passes and pensions
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making sure your pension rises every year. This policy is called the triple lock.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Last time, only nine seats short of a majority. This election will be just as close.

issues.brexitEurope: We’ll get Brexit done with our deal that’s ready to go from day one of new Parliament.
issues.education: World-class education - because no school is underfunded or left behind.
issues.health: Funding for the NHS, delivering 50 million more GP surgery appointments, 2000 more doctors, 40 new hospitals.
issues.immigration: An immigration system that supports our public services.
issues.lawCrime: 20,000 extra police officers. Giving officers the powers they need to get crime under control.
issues.socialWelfare: Protecting the winter fuel allowance, free bus passes and pensions with the triple lock.

leaflet.personalStatement: Believe in Britain’s potential. But it starts with you. At this election, vote to get Brexit done - and get on with the country’s priorities. Vote Conservative.

images.caption: Raising the threshold of National Insurance
Protecting the winter fuel allowance, free bus passes and pensions

A future where you feel safe when you walk home at night.
This is the kind of future we can create together.

personalStories.story: You should feel safe when you walk home at night. That’s why we’re hiring 20,000 extra police officers...

examples: The country has been stuck in a rut. Parliament spent the last three years going round in circles.
If you vote for anyone other than the Conservatives, we’ll get a hung parliament - and more years of delay and uncertainty.
The alternatives are more indecision and more delay with Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister.
